 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּשַׂק‎</span> ] **verb** ==part, open wide== (Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּסַק‎</span>, Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎פְּסַק‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, all ***cut, sever, cleave***); — 

**Qal** ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֲֵֹׁק שְׂפָתָיו‎</span> [[Prov.13.3|Prov 13:3]] i.e. one talkative. **Pi\`el** ***Imperfect*** 2 feminine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתְּפַשְּׂקִי אֶתרַֿגְלַיִךְ‎</span> [[Ezek.16.23|Ezek 16:23]] (with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎ל‎</span> person; sensu obsc.).
